alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Coalinga - Avenal; Los Banos - Dos Palos; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 9:56AM PST until February 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected along the West Side Mountains. Gusts to 40 mph across the western side of the San Joaquin Valley. * WHERE...West Side Mountains north of 198, Los Banos-Dos Palos, Coalinga-Avenal, West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties, West Side Mountains South of 198, Buttonwillow-Lost Hills-I5 and Buena Vista. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Coalinga - Avenal; Los Banos - Dos Palos; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
